SWORD.name: longsword
SWORD.examine_string: This is an ancient sword, probably crafted for a king or an important general. Elven runes cover the hilt, which also contains three large sapphires that shimmer with some magical light.

DOLL.name: ghostly doll
DOLL.examine_string: The doll left behind by the apparition is in the form of expressionless human child wrapped in tattered sheets. It kind of reminds you of your annoying cousin Scott.

ORC.name: nasty orc
ORC.examine_string: The orc is clad in dull, bloodstained chainmail and wields a massive spear. He kind of reminds you of your annoying cousin Scott.

SCROLL.name: crumpled scroll
SCROLL.examine_string: The scroll looks like it has a map of a maze.
